26#include "includes.h"
27__RCSID("$NetBSD: kexsntrup4591761x25519.c,v 1.2 2019/04/20 17:16:40 christos Exp $");
28
29#include <sys/types.h>
30
31#include <stdio.h>
32#include <string.h>
33#include <signal.h>
34
35#include "sshkey.h"
36#include "kex.h"
37#include "sshbuf.h"
38#include "digest.h"
39#include "ssherr.h"
40
41int
42kex_kem_sntrup4591761x25519_keypair(struct kex *kex)
43{
44 struct sshbuf *buf = NULL;
45 u_char *cp = NULL;
46 size_t need;
47 int r;
48
49 if ((buf = sshbuf_new()) == NULL)
50 return SSH_ERR_ALLOC_FAIL;
51 need = crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES + CURVE25519_SIZE;
52 if ((r = sshbuf_reserve(buf, need, &cp)) != 0)
53 goto out;
54 crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_keypair(cp, kex->sntrup4591761_client_key);
55#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
56 dump_digest("client public key sntrup4591761:", cp,
57 crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES);
58#endif
59 cp += crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES;
60 kexc25519_keygen(kex->c25519_client_key, cp);
61#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
62 dump_digest("client public key c25519:", cp, CURVE25519_SIZE);
63#endif
64 kex->client_pub = buf;
65 buf = NULL;
66 out:
67 sshbuf_free(buf);
68 return r;
69}
70
71int
72kex_kem_sntrup4591761x25519_enc(struct kex *kex,
73 const struct sshbuf *client_blob, struct sshbuf **server_blobp,
74 struct sshbuf **shared_secretp)
75{
76 struct sshbuf *server_blob = NULL;
77 struct sshbuf *buf = NULL;
78 const u_char *client_pub;
79 u_char *kem_key, *ciphertext, *server_pub;
80 u_char server_key[CURVE25519_SIZE];
81 u_char hash[SSH_DIGEST_MAX_LENGTH];
82 size_t need;
83 int r;
84
85 *server_blobp = NULL;
86 *shared_secretp = NULL;
87
88 /* client_blob contains both KEM and ECDH client pubkeys */
89 need = crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES + CURVE25519_SIZE;
90 if (sshbuf_len(client_blob) != need) {
91 r = SSH_ERR_SIGNATURE_INVALID;
92 goto out;
93 }
94 client_pub = sshbuf_ptr(client_blob);
95#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
96 dump_digest("client public key sntrup4591761:", client_pub,
97 crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES);
98 dump_digest("client public key 25519:",
99 client_pub + crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES,
100 CURVE25519_SIZE);
101#endif
102 /* allocate buffer for concatenation of KEM key and ECDH shared key */
103 /* the buffer will be hashed and the result is the shared secret */
104 if ((buf = sshbuf_new()) == NULL) {
105 r = SSH_ERR_ALLOC_FAIL;
106 goto out;
107 }
108 if ((r = sshbuf_reserve(buf, crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_BYTES,
109 &kem_key)) != 0)
110 goto out;
111 /* allocate space for encrypted KEM key and ECDH pub key */
112 if ((server_blob = sshbuf_new()) == NULL) {
113 r = SSH_ERR_ALLOC_FAIL;
114 goto out;
115 }
116 need = crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_CIPHERTEXTBYTES + CURVE25519_SIZE;
117 if ((r = sshbuf_reserve(server_blob, need, &ciphertext)) != 0)
118 goto out;
119 /* generate and encrypt KEM key with client key */
120 crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_enc(ciphertext, kem_key, client_pub);
121 /* generate ECDH key pair, store server pubkey after ciphertext */
122 server_pub = ciphertext + crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_CIPHERTEXTBYTES;
123 kexc25519_keygen(server_key, server_pub);
124 /* append ECDH shared key */
125 client_pub += crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_PUBLICKEYBYTES;
126 if ((r = kexc25519_shared_key_ext(server_key, client_pub, buf, 1)) < 0)
127 goto out;
128 if ((r = ssh_digest_buffer(kex->hash_alg, buf, hash, sizeof(hash))) != 0)
129 goto out;
130#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
131 dump_digest("server public key 25519:", server_pub, CURVE25519_SIZE);
132 dump_digest("server cipher text:", ciphertext,
133 crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_CIPHERTEXTBYTES);
134 dump_digest("server kem key:", kem_key, sizeof(kem_key));
135 dump_digest("concatenation of KEM key and ECDH shared key:",
136 sshbuf_ptr(buf), sshbuf_len(buf));
137#endif
138 /* string-encoded hash is resulting shared secret */
139 sshbuf_reset(buf);
140 if ((r = sshbuf_put_string(buf, hash,
141 ssh_digest_bytes(kex->hash_alg))) != 0)
142 goto out;
143#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
144 dump_digest("encoded shared secret:", sshbuf_ptr(buf), sshbuf_len(buf));
145#endif
146 *server_blobp = server_blob;
147 *shared_secretp = buf;
148 server_blob = NULL;
149 buf = NULL;
150 out:
151 explicit_bzero(hash, sizeof(hash));
152 explicit_bzero(server_key, sizeof(server_key));
153 sshbuf_free(server_blob);
154 sshbuf_free(buf);
155 return r;
156}
157
158int
159kex_kem_sntrup4591761x25519_dec(struct kex *kex,
160 const struct sshbuf *server_blob, struct sshbuf **shared_secretp)
161{
162 struct sshbuf *buf = NULL;
163 u_char *kem_key = NULL;
164 const u_char *ciphertext, *server_pub;
165 u_char hash[SSH_DIGEST_MAX_LENGTH];
166 size_t need;
167 int r, decoded;
168
169 *shared_secretp = NULL;
170
171 need = crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_CIPHERTEXTBYTES + CURVE25519_SIZE;
172 if (sshbuf_len(server_blob) != need) {
173 r = SSH_ERR_SIGNATURE_INVALID;
174 goto out;
175 }
176 ciphertext = sshbuf_ptr(server_blob);
177 server_pub = ciphertext + crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_CIPHERTEXTBYTES;
178#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
179 dump_digest("server cipher text:", ciphertext,
180 crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_CIPHERTEXTBYTES);
181 dump_digest("server public key c25519:", server_pub, CURVE25519_SIZE);
182#endif
183 /* hash concatenation of KEM key and ECDH shared key */
184 if ((buf = sshbuf_new()) == NULL) {
185 r = SSH_ERR_ALLOC_FAIL;
186 goto out;
187 }
188 if ((r = sshbuf_reserve(buf, crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_BYTES,
189 &kem_key)) != 0)
190 goto out;
191 decoded = crypto_kem_sntrup4591761_dec(kem_key, ciphertext,
192 kex->sntrup4591761_client_key);
193 if ((r = kexc25519_shared_key_ext(kex->c25519_client_key, server_pub,
194 buf, 1)) < 0)
195 goto out;
196 if ((r = ssh_digest_buffer(kex->hash_alg, buf, hash, sizeof(hash))) != 0)
197 goto out;
198#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
199 dump_digest("client kem key:", kem_key, sizeof(kem_key));
200 dump_digest("concatenation of KEM key and ECDH shared key:",
201 sshbuf_ptr(buf), sshbuf_len(buf));
202#endif
203 sshbuf_reset(buf);
204 if ((r = sshbuf_put_string(buf, hash,
205 ssh_digest_bytes(kex->hash_alg))) != 0)
206 goto out;
207#ifdef DEBUG_KEXECDH
208 dump_digest("encoded shared secret:", sshbuf_ptr(buf), sshbuf_len(buf));
209#endif
210 if (decoded != 0) {
211 r = SSH_ERR_SIGNATURE_INVALID;
212 goto out;
213 }
214 *shared_secretp = buf;
215 buf = NULL;
216 out:
217 explicit_bzero(hash, sizeof(hash));
218 sshbuf_free(buf);
219 return r;
220}
